page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: The people of{Lostwithiel}have found their recreation in gardening, walking, the river, and in membership of various clubs and societies. The pattern is changing as people now use the{Community Centre}where a number of sports facilities are available. It is noticeable that fewer people over the age of thirty years are to be found in the public houses and this is partly due to the price of alcohol, the noise of the juke box, and the awareness that if one enters a public house there is often no one with whom one is familiar. The{Social Club}is an exception and one can always find some one with whom one is familiar.
